mapper.sql: id, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, commodityId, orderId, number, price
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO shop_order_commodity_list ( creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, commodityId, orderId, number, price ) VALUES ( #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{status}, #{commodityId}, #{orderId}, #{number}, #{price} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE shop_order_commodity_list
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
status = #{status},
commodityId = #{commodityId},
orderId = #{orderId},
number = #{number},
price = #{price},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE shop_order_commodity_list
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
commodityId = #{map.commodityId},
orderId = #{map.orderId},
number = #{map.number},
price = #{map.price},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_order_commodity_list ( creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, commodityId, orderId, number, price ) VALUES ( #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.commodityId}, #{map.orderId}, #{map.number}, #{map.price} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM shop_order_commodity_list
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND commodityId like CONCAT('%', #{commodityId} , '%')
AND orderId like CONCAT('%', #{orderId} , '%')
AND number like CONCAT('%', #{number} , '%')
AND price like CONCAT('%', #{price} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
